text:
This is a small patch to add a verbose="true|false" attribute to <subant/>.

When this attribute is set, subant echoes messages describing which directories
it is entering/ leaving. It is disabled by default to match the current behaviour.

This is really helpful with large multi-module projects having a hierarchical
build system.

I'd really appreciate if this could be incorporated for 1.7 release.
